long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PricePin Organizer is an expansion for Pinterest which lets you tag pins and organize them into categories to keep track of the total price of selected items. It also offers import and export functionality to share your tagged pins, in addition to being able to edit your data (in example using spreadsheets).
